Text: A/V? Maybe I'm crazy, but I like Glenn Close in this show. And I don't normally like her. I mostly d/l this for my folks who don't have DirecTV but love this show. I watch it too though. I'm hearing this as it comes out... I'm sad.

Just wanted to add my name to the list of grateful downloaders - thank you for this! Are you intending to upload the whole season as it airs? You seem to be the only person uploading these episodes in a decent size, and it's very much appreciated.
Thank you. I hope you continue with the rest of the series. Great show!
Downloading now. Thanks for uploading. This show is amazing!
